channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Sling App CMS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Sling App CMS

item.title: CVE-2022-43670|2024-08-03T13:40:05.707Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20sling%20app%20cms
item.description: An improper neutralization of input during web page generation ('Cross-site Scripting') [CWE-79] vulnerability in Sling App CMS version 1.1.0 and prior may allow an authenticated remote attacker to perform a reflected cross site scripting (XSS) attack in the taxonomy management feature.
